name.baseName: 直接还原铁生产;直接还原铁;焦炉煤气直接还原

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The described process refers to the production of Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) using coal-based direct reduction processes. Typically, this DRI production is part of the steelmaking industry, where it serves as a cleaner, alternative iron source to traditional blast furnace methods. The process utilizes by-product gas from coke ovens (Coke Oven Gas, COG) in a Direct Reduction Iron (DRI) generation process. It applies to industrial steel production facilities seeking to reduce their dependency on coking coal and increase their energy efficiency and lower their greenhouse gas emissions.
所描述的过程涉及使用基于煤的直接还原工艺生产直接还原铁（DRI）。这种DRI生产通常是钢铁制造工业的一部分，在这里它作为传统高炉方法的更清洁的替代铁源。该过程利用焦炉产生的副产品气（焦炉煤气，COG）进行直接还原铁（DRI）生成过程。它适用于寻求减少对焦煤依赖、提高能源效率和降低温室气体排放的工业钢铁生产设施。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process refers to the production of Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) using coal-based direct reduction processes. Typically, this DRI production is part of the steelmaking industry, where it serves as a cleaner, alternative iron source to traditional blast furnace methods. The process utilizes by-product gas from coke ovens (Coke Oven Gas, COG) in a Direct Reduction Iron (DRI) generation process. It applies to industrial steel production facilities seeking to reduce their dependency on coking coal and increase their energy efficiency and lower their greenhouse gas emissions.
所描述的过程涉及使用基于煤的直接还原工艺生产直接还原铁（DRI）。这种DRI生产通常是钢铁制造工业的一部分，在这里它作为传统高炉方法的更清洁的替代铁源。该过程利用焦炉产生的副产品气（焦炉煤气，COG）进行直接还原铁（DRI）生成过程。它适用于寻求减少对焦煤依赖、提高能源效率和降低温室气体排放的工业钢铁生产设施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China
The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this LCI data set for the direct reduction iron (DRI) route, it is crucial to reference the average operating data from relevant Chinese demonstration projects. The methodological advice includes ensuring that modeling reflects the specific technological applications and energy inputs outlined for the COG-DR and H-DR routes, with consideration of the scalability within the Chinese context. The data should be utilized with attention to the fact that it includes estimates from simulations, laboratory tests, and process modeling, and thus may require adjustment when applied to contexts or technological setups outside of those studied. Additionally, when considering the LCI data for inclusion in comprehensive environmental assessments, ensure that system boundaries are properly defined, especially regarding the inclusion or exclusion of subsequent recycling processes.

使用直接还原铁（DRI）路线的LCI数据时，必须参考中国相关示范项目的平均操作数据。方法学建议包括确保建模反映了为COG-DR和H-DR路线概述的特定技术应用和能量输入，并考虑中国语境下的可扩展性。数据应注意到它包括了来自模拟、实验室测试和过程建模的估计，并且可能需要调整，以便应用于所研究之外的情境或技术设置。此外，在考虑将LCI数据纳入全面的环境评估时，确保正确定义系统边界，特别是关于随后的循环利用过程的包含或排除。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.
